survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Pharmacy Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online pharmacy services to assess their satisfaction, identify pain points, and improve service offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online pharmacy services?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use online pharmacy services?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online pharmacy? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Randomize the order of options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online pharmacy? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using our online pharmacy service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure the scale is balanced with a neutral midpoint.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using our online pharmacy service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our online pharmacy service?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly input.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our online pharmacy service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our online pharmacy service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple single-choice question to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend our online pharmacy service to others?
